abstract: Andy Pettitte threw out the ceremonial first pitch before Game 2 of the Yankees' American League division series Sunday, dressed in a blue Yankees hooded sweatshirt and jeans.
snippet: Andy Pettitte threw out the ceremonial first pitch before Game 2 of the Yankees' American League division series Sunday, dressed in a blue Yankees hooded sweatshirt and jeans.

headline.main: Pettitte Returns to the Mound, in a Ceremonial Capacity
